entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
